metadata.purpose: Comprehensive pronunciation dictionary for Nobody Knows podcast production

Yoshua Bengio.context: AI researcher, Turing Award winner, deep learning pioneer
Yoshua Bengio.test_phrase: Yoshua Bengio's research on neural networks

Geoffrey Hinton.context: Deep learning pioneer, Godfather of AI

Fei-Fei Li.test_phrase: Fei-Fei Li created the ImageNet dataset

Andrew Ng.test_phrase: Andrew Ng teaches machine learning globally

OECD.full_name: Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development
OECD.test_phrase: The OECD published comprehensive AI guidelines

algorithm.test_phrase: The algorithm processes complex data patterns

convolutional.context: Type of neural network for image processing
convolutional.test_phrase: Convolutional networks excel at image recognition

hyperparameter.context: Configuration setting for machine learning models

percentage_format.pronunciation_rule: Read number followed by 'percent' with slight pause

decimal_format.pronunciation_rule: Read digits before decimal, say 'point', then read each digit after

year_format.pronunciation_rule: Read as grouped digits (nineteen ninety-five, twenty twenty-five)

UNESCO.full_name: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization

IEEE.full_name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

implementation_notes.testing_approach: Test each pronunciation with short phrases before full episode integration
implementation_notes.fallback_strategy: If phoneme tag fails, rely on natural pronunciation with context clues
implementation_notes.update_frequency: Add new terms as encountered in research and production
implementation_notes.voice_training: Consider voice-specific pronunciation tuning for repeated terms

quality_validation.testing_protocol: Generate 30-second test clips for each new pronunciation
quality_validation.validation_method: STT analysis + human review for critical terms
quality_validation.success_criteria: Consistent pronunciation across multiple synthesis attempts
